sentences.en: ‘I’m feeling hungry.’ ‘Me too.’
sentences.cn: “我觉得饿了。”“我也是。”

sentences.en: ‘What was the weather like?’ ‘Oh, not too bad.’
sentences.cn: “天气如何？” “不是太糟。”

sentences.en: ‘You not listening, and too besides you don't have to shout at the damn bird so!’.
sentences.cn: “你不在听，而且你也没必要朝这只该死的鸟那样大叫！”。

sentences.en: ‘You not listening, and too besides you don't have to shout at the damn bird so!’.
sentences.cn: “你不在听，而且你也没必要朝这只该死的鸟那样大叫！”。

sentences.en: ‘You not listening, and too besides you don't have to shout at the damn bird so!’.
sentences.cn: “你不在听，而且你也没必要朝这只该死的鸟那样大叫！”。

sentences.en: ‘You not listening, and too besides you don't have to shout at the damn bird so!’.
sentences.cn: “你不在听，而且你也没必要朝这只该死的鸟那样大叫！”。

sentences.en: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentences.cn: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

sentences.en: Can I come too?
sentences.cn: 我也来行吗？

sentences.en: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.cn: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
sentences.cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

sentences.en: Don'tspill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: failures are all too common.
sentences.cn: 失败太平常了。

sentences.en: He drank too much and is paying dearly for it.
sentences.cn: 他现在正为酗酒付出沉重的代价。

sentences.en: He is clearly too partisan to be a referee.
sentences.cn: 他倾向性过于明显，当不了裁判。

sentences.en: her sight's none too good.
sentences.cn: 她的视力一点也不好。

sentences.en: her sight's none too good.
sentences.cn: 她的视力一点也不好。

sentences.en: her sight's none too good.
sentences.cn: 她的视力一点也不好。

sentences.en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
sentences.cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

sentences.en: If he demands too much, the unions will vote him down.
sentences.cn: 如果他要求太多，工会就会投票撤换他。

sentences.en: It’s a more efficient system and it’s cheaper too.
sentences.cn: 这个系统更有效，也更便宜。

sentences.en: Leather jeans that are too big will make you look larger.
sentences.cn: 过于肥大的皮裤会让你看起来块头更大。

sentences.en: No detail was too small to escape her attention.
sentences.cn: 再小的细节都逃不过她的眼睛。

sentences.en: Older mothers tend to be too idealistic about the pleasures of motherhood.
sentences.cn: 较年长的母亲往往对身为人母的乐趣过于理想化。

sentences.en: People usually complain about having to deal with too much bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 人们经常抱怨不得不应付太多的繁文缛节。

sentences.en: She doesn’t seem too upset about it.
sentences.cn: 她对此好像不是很难过。

sentences.en: She was none too pleased (= not at all pleased ) when I told her.
sentences.cn: 我告诉她时，她一点也不高兴。

sentences.en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentences.en: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.cn: 路上车辆太多。

sentences.en: There were people from all over Europe, and America too.
sentences.cn: 有来自欧洲各地的人，也有来自美国的人。

sentences.en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentences.cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentences.en: Too bad he used his intelligence for criminal purposes.
sentences.cn: 他把聪明都用在了犯罪上，太可惜了。

sentences.en: You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

sentences.en: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.cn: 你往汤里放盐太多。

phrases.tran_cn: 太（强调达到极端或不好的程度）

trans.tran_cn: 也，太，过于，（表示感谢）极其，（表示强调）而且，还
trans.tran_en: more than is acceptable or possible
more than is acceptable or possible
